title: Custom Frameworks
description: Custom frameworks built using a combination of open source projects and custom code, used as a basis for projects

items.title: Custom PHP framework for backend and rendering frontend
Custom Javascript framework that allowed for shared code across backend and frontend, including shared database models
Python and OpenCV, with WebSockets, for OCR and device communication

Custom kiosk application built with Chromium and Node, as a replacement for an Electron application, using WebSockets for communication, with multiple serial device interfaces, used for controlling media displays
Typescript Node library built for communication with USB devices, that was integrated into a Node Express backend
Interfaces with FFmpeg for backend servers for video stitching, conversion, and chroma key. Created custom FFmpeg filter based on existing standalone chroma key library
Linux-based BLE hub application, written in C++. Integrated MQTT client library and bluez Bluetooth communication

title: Commercial and Open Source Frameworks
description: Commercial and open source frameworks used in projects to build custom cloud and mobile applications

items.title: Angular with Router, Material, and Bootstrap
Node with Express & Mocha for Creating Tests, with Knex, Sequelize, or Mongoose
React with React Router and Bootstrap

title: Services
description: Commercial services used to deploy major features or entire infrastructure for applications

items.title: AWS - EC2, S3, Lamdba, CloudWatch, VPC, RDS, Mechanical Turk, Elemental MediaConvert

title: Integrations
description: 3rd party services integrated to extend applications

items.title: Twilio - Text Messaging, Calls, Video Conferencing
Payment Gateways - Stripe, Paypal, Authorize.Net, CardConnect
Redox and Xealth for HL7 health system integration
Insurance ceding/fronting and reinsurance APIs for underwriting and accounting
Support for 'Know Your Customer' and 'Customer Identification Program' - LexisNexis (EIR, Credit MVR, Risk Classifier), MIB Consumer File, Milliman RX, Ingenix MedPoint

title: Languages
description: Expertise in multiple high-level programming languages

title: Databases
description: Creating and managing schema along with SQL, NoSQL, and ORM code development

items.title: ORM and Query Builders - Sequelize, SQLAlchemy, Knex

title: Project Tools
description: Tools used to help manage projects, including team collaboration on code and design

items.title: JIRA and Redmine, managing issues and project progress
Lucidchart, supplementing technical documentation including UML and architecture/database diagrams
Team collaboration, including Slack and Mattermost
Build tools, including CMake and Webpack
Git command line and GUI tools, such as Sublime Merge or Sourcetree. Created, managed, and reviewed Github pull requests

title: IT Administration
description: Knowledge in server and infrastructure management

items.title: Managing AWS Instances with Linux, installing packages or Docker environments, and maintenance
Managing on-premises physical systems with Linux-based servers
Using AWS Security Rules and utilities like iptables to secure servers
Setting up and managing databases for production (Linux servers) and development platforms (Windows, OS X, Linux)
Management of embedded systems using Intel NUCs,  Raspberry PIs, and custom BLE devices
Development of remote management methods for systems using VPN servers, providing profile deployment automation
Setting up and maintaining small business on-premises networks, using pfSense for the router
Using Windows, OS X, and Linux in a GUI environment. Using Windows Command Line & PowerShell, OS X Terminal, and Linux Terminal
